name: The void rolls back
description:
"The void rolls back" is a game made in 48h for the GMTK jam 2022.

It's the end of the world again. The void has taken over everything, and is causing entropy in all 6 regions. However, you and your companions know the drill by now. Armed with powerful reality-altering dice, you set out on a journey to restore the lands, and hopefully beat the end of times again. To win, you must reach the edge of the world and defeat the horror which lurks there.

  • WASD/Arrow keys: move
  • Spacebar: shoot
  • Tab: change bullet
  • Escape: return to title screen
  • F4: fullscreen (windows only)

Credits:

  • Code, writing, music (music  made before the jam): Adrien Dittrick
  • Artwork: Shinlalala
